oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Herbert Hoover
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Herbert Hoover and signed with: "To Emil Hurja with the kind Regards of Herbert Hoover."

Herbert Hoover (1874-1964) was the 31st President of the United States (1929-1933). He had served as Secretary of Commerce in the Warren G. Harding and Calvin Coolidge administrations prior to becoming president. He was defeated in the 1932 presidential election by Franklin Delano Roosevelt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hoover, Herbert, 1874-1964
